Articles.Content: Thank you to all who have helped me with questions...I have gone from about 100m flights to full orbits in 2 days. I have a ton to learn but thanks again to all the helpful people on this forum.
How about rewarding them for their help with pictures?

How about rewarding them for their help with pictures?

I second this! I am glad you were able to get help though. Once you "get it" the possibilities are endless!
Now up the difficulty and get the FAR, DRE, RSS mod with Real fuels and the AYJ jet engine mod... you will be happy when you break mach 1 with a jet and bring it back.

How about rewarding them for their help with pictures?

I agree. I think we deserve something for all my... our hard work.
Remember, F2 removes the UI for cooler screenshots.
